类 RedisAccessor

  • java.lang.Object

  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
    直接已知子类:
    RedisTemplate

    public class RedisAccessor
extends Object
implements org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
    Base class for RedisTemplate defining common properties. Not intended to be used directly.

    • 方法详细资料

      • afterPropertiesSet

        public void afterPropertiesSet()
        从接口复制的说明: org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
        Invoked by a BeanFactory after it has set all bean properties supplied (and satisfied BeanFactoryAware and ApplicationContextAware).

        This method allows the bean instance to perform initialization only possible when all bean properties have been set and to throw an exception in the event of misconfiguration.

        指定者:
        afterPropertiesSet 在接口中 org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean

      • getConnectionFactory

        @Nullable
public RedisConnectionFactory getConnectionFactory()
        Returns the connectionFactory.
        返回:
        Returns the connectionFactory. Can be null

      • getRequiredConnectionFactory

        public RedisConnectionFactory getRequiredConnectionFactory()
        Returns the required RedisConnectionFactory or throws IllegalStateException if the connection factory is not set.
        返回:
        the associated RedisConnectionFactory.
        抛出:
        IllegalStateException - if the connection factory is not set.
        从以下版本开始:
        2.0

      • setConnectionFactory

        public void setConnectionFactory(RedisConnectionFactory connectionFactory)
        Sets the connection factory.
        参数:
        connectionFactory - The connectionFactory to set.
